languages.text: "Как бы то ни было, Ваша Светлость, я благодарен вам и сестре Ардженте за свое спасение. Я надеюсь, что смогу как-нибудь отплатить вам за жалость, проявленную к покойнику".

traits.locale_text: "Как бы то ни было, Ваша Светлость, я благодарен вам и сестре Ардженте за свое спасение. Я надеюсь, что смогу как-нибудь отплатить вам за жалость, проявленную к покойнику".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead."
languages.original_text: "Как бы то ни было, Ваша Светлость, я благодарен вам и сестре Ардженте за свое спасение. Я надеюсь, что смогу как-нибудь отплатить вам за жалость, проявленную к покойнику".

traits.locale_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a dead man."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a dead man."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a dead man walking."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a dead man walking."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: 「いずれにせよ、陛下。私の命を救ってださったあなたとシスター・アルジェンタには感謝しています。生ける死人を哀れんでくれたあなたに、いつか恩返しがしたい」
languages.original_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead."

traits.locale_text: 「いずれにせよ、陛下。私の命を救ってださったあなたとシスター・アルジェンタには感謝しています。生ける死人を哀れんでくれたあなたに、いつか恩返しがしたい」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: “无论如何，大人，我很感激您和阿洁塔修女救了我一命。希望有朝一日，我能报答您的救命之恩。”
languages.original_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead."

traits.locale_text: “无论如何，大人，我很感激您和阿洁塔修女救了我一命。希望有朝一日，我能报答您的救命之恩。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: «En cualquier caso, les estoy agradecido a usted y a la Hermana Argenta por salvarme la vida. Espero tener ocasión de devolverles el favor por apiadarse de alguien a quien podían haber dado por muerto».
languages.original_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead."

traits.locale_text: «En cualquier caso, les estoy agradecido a usted y a la Hermana Argenta por salvarme la vida. Espero tener ocasión de devolverles el favor por apiadarse de un muerto andante».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "Wie dem auch sei, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich bin Euch und Schwester Argenta dankbar, dass Ihr mir das Leben gerettet habt. Ich hoffe, dass ich mich eines Tages dafür revanchieren kann, dass Ihr Mitleid mit einem Todgeweihten hattet."
languages.original_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead."

traits.locale_text: "Wie dem auch sei, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich bin Euch und Schwester Argenta dankbar, dass Ihr mir das Leben gerettet habt. Ich hoffe, dass ich mich eines Tages dafür revanchieren kann, dass Ihr Mitleid mit einem wandelnden Toten hattet."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: « Quoi qu'il en soit, Votre Seigneurie, je vous suis reconnaissant, à vous et à sœur Argenta, d'avoir eu pitié d'un mort en sursis et de m'avoir sauvé la vie. J'espère pouvoir un jour rembourser ma dette. »
languages.original_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi qu'il en soit, Votre Seigneurie, je vous suis reconnaissant, à vous et à sœur Argenta, d'avoir eu pitié d'un mort en sursis et de m'avoir sauvé la vie. J'espère pouvoir un jour rembourser ma dette. »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, her hâlükârda Rahibe Argenta ile hayatımı kurtardığınız için müteşekkirim. Umarım bir gün, ölüden hâllice bir adama merhamet etmenizin karşılığını verebilirim."
languages.original_text: "In any case, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm grateful to you and Sister Argenta for saving my life. I hope one day to repay you for taking pity on a man who was as good as dead."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, her hâlükârda Rahibe Argenta ile hayatımı kurtardığınız için müteşekkirim. Umarım bir gün ölüden hâllice bir adama merhamet etmenizin karşılığını verebilirim."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
